App Definition',p:'Careerak is a digital platform for HR, recruitment, and career development.'},{h:'2. Scope',p:'Applies to all users globally across all platforms.'},{h:'3. Data Collection',p:'Personal, Professional, and Technical data are collected to serve you better.'},{h:'4. Usage',p:'For account management, personalization, and security.'},{h:'5. Sharing',p:'We never sell your data. Shared only with employers upon your request.'},{h:'6. Storage',p:'Secure international server storage with full encryption.'},{h:'7.
